name: Haunted Library
description:
A Ghost Is Loose in the Library!

And that ghost is you! Collect books filled with knowledge while avoiding or smashing through obstacles with your ghostly energy!

Controls

WASD to move left and right and teleport between the three levels

Hold down Left click to select a red projectile, right click for blue, or both for purple, then press Space to fire the projectile

Break the block by matching the correct colored projectile

Features

Endless 2D scroller

Pixel Art by me

Open-Source Music by Kevin Macleod

SFX from Unity Store User Dr.Game

Notes

I was unsure which of the two build types was correct, so I uploaded them both.

Game currently is not fully functional; the player cannot take damage. It's truly endless! :(
